tool_description: An API that returns the estimated population, from a selected country.
title: Countries Population

api_list.name: Country Details Level 1
api_list.description:
Specified one valid param and retrieve access level 1 information about a country:
- english name
- population (in millions)


Valid params are country english name, ISO code 2 or ISO code 3

required_parameters.name: param
required_parameters.description:
For the param you must use only:
1. the country english name
2. country ISO code 2
3. country ISO code 3

- The param is not case sensitive.
- Accept spaces between a country name

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{param}/lv1/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Total Population
api_list.description:
Returns the estimated total population

- Number in millions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com/countries/total_population/"

api_list.name: Country Details Level 2
api_list.description:
Specified one valid param and retrieve access level 2 information about a country:
- english name
- ISO code 2
- numeric code
- population (in millions)

Valid params are country english name, ISO code 2 or ISO code 3

required_parameters.name: param
required_parameters.description:
For the param you must use only:
1. the country english name
2. country ISO code 2
3. country ISO code 3

- The param is not case sensitive.
- Accept spaces between a country name

api_list.code:

url = "https://countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{param}/lv2/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country Details Level 3
api_list.description:
Specified one valid param and retrieve access level 3 information about a country:

- english name
- french name
- ISO code 2
- ISO code 3
- numeric code
- population (in millions)

Valid params are country english name, ISO code 2 or ISO code 3

required_parameters.name: param
required_parameters.description:
For the param you must use only:
1. the country english name
2. country ISO code 2
3. country ISO code 3

- The param is not case sensitive.
- Accept spaces between a country name

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{param}/lv3/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: All countries names
api_list.description: Returns all countries english full names. Useful when need to know wich country names to search for.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com/countries/names/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-population3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
